name: Celeste - Voodoo Queen Halloween Art Print
description:
This original drawing features "Celeste", my Voodoo Queen, a dark princess from New Orleans, Louisiana. She stands outside of her voodoo shop, where people come to buy love potions, good luck charms and other gris-gris. She is conjuring the spirit of her lost love, barely visible beneath her fingertips.

"Celeste" contains lots of little details, from the boning on her burgundy corset to the skull and glasses of her lost lover, to the magical black cat and glass bottles full of potion in the shop window. The full moon and night sky lend their light, while Celeste works her voodoo with the bubbling cauldron.

The original drawing was created with pencil, ink, watercolor pencil and oil pastels. This listing is for a professional-quality art print on archival photo paper with a matte finish.

Several print sizes are available - see options below.

name: Nixie Dreams - Mermaid Art Print
description:
This original mermaid art drawing was inspired by the Germanic legend of "nixies", or shape shifting water spirits that can appear in human form. My "Nixie Dreams" portrays a mermaid, or nixie, that looks up through the water's surface at her reflection, which is that of a human girl.

This mermaid's skin is a fantastic color of pink, with purple fins on her feet, arms and legs that help her when swimming through the depths of the ocean. Her long flowing purple and pink hair is striking against the lime green and turquoise of the ocean's shallows. Two companion seahorses watch her intently.

Pencil, watercolor pencil and oil pastels were used to create this original artwork. This listing is for a professional-quality art print on archival photo paper with a matte finish.

Several print sizes are available - see options below.

name: Shortcut - Red Riding Hood Art Print
description:
Who's that I see walking through these woods? Why, it's Little Red Riding Hood!

My original artwork - "Shortcut" - was created in oil pastel & colored pencil on archival art board. This listing is for a professional-quality art print on archival photo paper with a matte finish.

Several print sizes are available - see options below.

name: Guardian - Dragon Angel Art Print
description:
"Guardian" features a battle of good vs. evil... but who truly is the guardian? Is this a mother protecting her baby or an angel sent to rescue a stolen dragon hatchling?

Graphite, pencil, ink, colored pencil and pastel were used to create the original artwork. This listing is for a professional-quality art print on archival photo paper with a matte finish.

Several print sizes are available - see options below.

name: Lying In Wait - Dragon Art Print
description:
"Lying In Wait" features an unsuspecting maiden princess traveling at breakneck speed into the clutches of a ravenous dragon.

This piece was inspired by a speed trap set by a clever policeman on a back country road. The police car was hidden in a long driveway flanked by tall bushes and as we maneuvered the twisting road, we spotted the flash of shiny cobalt blue. Needless to say, we were quite grateful that we were not speeding at the time and laughed that he was "like a dragon, lying in wait for passing travelers". This drawing is the manifestation of that conversation.

Graphite, pencil, ink, colored pencil and pastel were used to create the original artwork. This listing is for a professional-quality art print on archival photo paper with a matte finish.

Several print sizes are available - see options below.
